    Admin Configuration

    Admin TOC

    • Streaming Setup
      • Stream Config Links

    Instructions for the setup and use of the video server.

    Streaming Setup

    Manage streams through the links to the Restreamer server instances running on this server shown in the table or in the Stream Config links on the left or in the table below.

    Stream Config Links

    Livestream Stream Config Link stream link
    AW-Main /ccawest-main/ rtmp://128.199.9.133:11935/live/external.stream?token=j5GZw5Jh4tdhQDz4BZ7xH2xm3K
    BW-Main /ccbwest-main/ rtmp://128.199.9.133:11938/live/external.stream?token=sAFB3T6NK9Gc2NN
    BE-Main /ccbeast-main/ rtmp://128.199.9.133:11941/live/external.stream?token=5g4jKC7MH7m9P5t
    CE-Main /ccceast-main/ rtmp://128.199.9.133:11944/live/external.stream?token=35E9MNzq63D4DzS
    Custom /jamesFeed/ rtmp://128.199.9.133:11947/live/external.stream?token=xeeGKh7KS2mtR9H

    Each stream is a Docker container running the Restreamer server. The stream must be started in order to run. This is accomplished through the Restreamer admin interface.

    (Please reach out to the administrator for a password to configure these streams.)

    Configuration

    New streams cannot be created here, for that you must contact the admin

    If you see the (Error: Your stream wasn’t accessible. …. Operation not permitted) the system is functioning. Send some stream there and it will work

    You must ensure that the stream is started and is listening in the stream config link.

    See the setup guide for more instruction.

    Setup

    Each stream uses a separate port to communicate with the video signal stream. Use the configuration details from below to connect the camera system to the server to stream.

    Livestream Player Link Live Image Link
    AW-Main /Main/player.html /Main/images/live.jpg
    BW-Main /Main/player.html /Main/images/live.jpg
    BE-Main /Main/player.html /Main/images/live.jpg
    CE-Main /Main/player.html /Main/images/live.jpg
    Custom /jamesFeed/player.html https:///images/live.jpg

    Custom Feed

    Use this feed for custom mixed events using some software like OBS to add content.
